cardList.name: Ventriloquist
cardList.description: Send voice to target area within 200 ft

cardList.name: Bird's Eye
cardList.description: View a target area from the sky, Lasts for 1 minute

cardList.name: Fairy Light
cardList.description: Gain a floating orb that follow the character and illuminates a 50 ft radius

cardList.name: Heal Self
cardList.description: Heal for 1d4 + 2

cardList.name: Fool's Cackle
cardList.description: A target is surrounded by violent laughter that causes them to have disadvantage on 1d4 next roll(s)

cardList.name: Shout of the Bodyguard
cardList.description: Taunt target to attack you

cardList.name: Guess Who?
cardList.description: Cause target to feel as though someone is tapping on their shoulder

cardList.name: Smoke Puppet
cardList.description:
Create a copy of a target
 The copy can not interact with physical objects and has 1 hp

cardList.name: Fleet Foot
cardList.description: Disengage and move 2x normal movement

cardList.name: Coin Pact
cardList.description:
Spend 1gp
 Bond with a simple familiar that will follow commands until death

cardList.name: Healing Melody
cardList.description: Heal all allies within 30 ft 1d4 + CHA

cardList.name: North Wind
cardList.description:
Summon a strong gust that pushes a target back 3d10 ft
 If the target makes contact with any solid surface, they take 1d6 bludgeoning damage

cardList.name: Babel's Tongue
cardList.description: Gain the ability to speak any 1 language for 1 min

cardList.name: Flare
cardList.description:
Ignite a target
 Deal 1d6 + INT fire damage

cardList.name: Apprentice's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random simple card

cardList.name: Shard
cardList.description:
Cast a ice shard at a target
 Deal 1d6 + INT ice damage

cardList.name: Curse
cardList.description:
Inflict a curse upon a target
 Deal 1d6 + INT necrotic damage

cardList.name: Shock
cardList.description:
Shock a target with a small jolt of electricity causing target's movement to be halved next turn
 Deal 1d4 + INT electric damage

cardList.name: Fog of War
cardList.description:
Fill surroundings with fog
 All characters, except the caster, have disadvantage
 Lasts 1d4 min

cardList.name: Hover
cardList.description: Target now levitates 1 ft above the ground for 1 hr

cardList.name: Wizard's Armor
cardList.description: Target gains +1 AC for 10 min

cardList.name: Phase Shift
cardList.description: Swap places with a visible target within a 200 ft range

cardList.name: Ether Bolt
cardList.description:
Cast a magic bolt at a target
Deal 1d6 + INT damage

cardList.name: Monk's Prayer
cardList.description: At the start of your next turn heal 1d8 + CHA

cardList.name: Shadow Strike
cardList.description:
Teleport behind a target within 50 ft
Take a normal attack turn as a bonus action

cardList.name: Alchemist's Cask
cardList.description:
Throw an alchemist's brew at a target
Deal 1d6 + WIS acid damage and 1d4 to any targets within 5 ft

cardList.name: Soft Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies within 30 ft 1d4 + CHA

cardList.name: Ether Coating
cardList.description: Give a weapon +1d4 on damage rolls for 3 turns

cardList.name: Drain
cardList.description:
Deal 1d4 + WIS
Heal for 1/2 damage dealt

cardList.name: Razor's Edge
cardList.description:
Take a normal attack turn
Target takes extra 1/2 damage inflicted next turn

cardList.name: Counter
cardList.description:
Cast at anytime to block enemy attack
Pass next turn

cardList.name: Holy Light
cardList.description: Heal a target in a 30 ft range for 1d8 + WIS

cardList.name: Quicksand
cardList.description:
Create a pit of quicksand
 Targets caught remain rooted until a successful STR saving throw

cardList.name: Wizard's Barrier
cardList.description: Create an invisible barrier that stops the next hit, unless it is a critical roll

cardList.name: Shout of the Bulwark
cardList.description:
Taunt target to attack you
 Gain +1 AC for 1 min

cardList.name: Scouter Eye
cardList.description: Get detailed information on a targets stats

cardList.name: Berserker's Spirit
cardList.description: Gain +2 to your next hit roll if below 25% health; take a normal attack turn as a bonus action

cardList.name: Spirit Lash
cardList.description:
Target gains +10 ft range to melee attacks
 Lasts for 1 min

cardList.name: Transmute
cardList.description: Change one card into any card of one rarity tier lower

cardList.name: Spirit Sap
cardList.description:
Implant seeds into a target
 Sap 1d4 health from target for 1d4 + 2 turns

cardList.name: Rain of Blades
cardList.description:
Rain down ethereal blades on a target
 Deal 4d4 damage

cardList.name: Caster's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random special card

cardList.name: Fireball
cardList.description:
Cast a fireball at a target
 Deal 1d10 + INT fire damage

cardList.name: Frost Blade
cardList.description:
Cast a frost blade that hits any targets in a 10ft x 20ft cone in front of you
 Deal 1d6 + INT ice damage

cardList.name: Spreading Lightning
cardList.description:
Cast a lightning bolt on a target, if another character is within 15 ft cast again on new target
Can not hit the a target twice
Deal 1d8 + INT electric damage

cardList.name: Dark Pact
cardList.description: Bond with a special familiar that will follow commands until death

cardList.name: Aggressive Aura
cardList.description: Cause all targets in a 30 ft radius to become intimidated

cardList.name: Berserker's Focus
cardList.description:
Choose a target: you may only attack them for 1 min, but you deal 2x damage during this period
Taunt all enemies within a 25 ft radius to attack you

cardList.name: Monk's Chant
cardList.description: At the start of your next turn heal all allies in a 30 ft radius 1d8 + WIS

cardList.name: Nothing Personal
cardList.description:
Teleport behind a target in 50 ft range
Deal 2d6 + DEX slashing damage

cardList.name: Ether Volley
cardList.description:
Cast 3 ether bolts, that can be directed a different targets
Each bolt deals 1d6 + INT

cardList.name: Sacrifical Spike
cardList.description: Take X damage, deal 2x damage taken to target

cardList.name: Warm Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies within 30 ft 1d6 + CHA

cardList.name: Mist Form
cardList.description:
You disappear into the Shrouded Plane
 Lasts up to 5x character movement

cardList.name: Skull Key
cardList.description: Open any locked door

cardList.name: Diviner's Sight
cardList.description:
Gain +1 to all saving throws for 24 hours
 Character has eye on their forehead for duration

cardList.name: Shout of the Guardian
cardList.description:
Taunt all enemies in a 50 ft radius to attack you
 Double your health for 1 min

cardList.name: Executioner
cardList.description: Kill an target that is below 20% health

cardList.name: Heaven's Kiss
cardList.description: Revive a dead target

cardList.name: Blood Pact
cardList.description: Bond with a heroic spirit that will follow commands until death

cardList.name: Last Stand
cardList.description: If you are below 10% health, heal 2d12 + 4 and knock any enemies back 30 ft

cardList.name: Duel Marble
cardList.description: Transport you and a target to a ethereal plane until one dies

cardList.name: Wizard's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random heroic card

cardList.name: Radiant Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies in a 50 ft radius 1d10 + CHA

cardList.name: Wildfire
cardList.description:
Cast a 10x20 ft cone of fire
Deals 1d12 fire damage and burns targets 1d4 for 3 turns

cardList.name: Plague
cardList.description:
Infect a target
Deal 1d6 + WIS necrotic damage for 1d4 + WIS turns

cardList.name: Ether Explosion
cardList.description:
Cast ether bolts in a 10 ft sphere around you
All enemies take 1d6 + INT + the inverse of their distance from you damage

cardList.name: Banish
cardList.description: Send a target to the Ethereal Plane for 1d6 hours

cardList.name: Angel's Wings
cardList.description: Gain the ability to fly for 1d6 hrs + 1

cardList.name: Shout of the Colossus
cardList.description:
Taunt all enemies in a 50 ft radius to attack you
 Become immune for 1 min

cardList.name: Soul Pact
cardList.description: Bond with a legendary familiar that will follow commands until death

cardList.name: Creator's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random legendary card

cardList.name: Forest of Blades
cardList.description:
Cast a 25x25 ft field of blades
Targets in the field take 1d10 + WIS slashing damage per 5ft moved every turn

cardList.name: Thunder Lord's Fury
cardList.description:
Strike every enemy in a 50 ft radius with lightning, rooting all targets on next turn
Deal 2d6 + INT lightning damage to each target

cardList.name: Iron Maiden
cardList.description:
Lock target in a iron coffin
Target takes 2d10 damage each turn until they succeed in a STR saving throw

cardList.name: Emperor's Fist
cardList.description:
Character’s fists become charged with celestial power
 Character deals 2d10 + 6 + Str mod on hit and can take a bonus action to hit again with fists
 Lasts for 1 min

cardList.name: Dragon's Heart
cardList.description: Summon the spirit of one of the 6 celestial dragons

familiars.name: Coin Goblin
familiars.description:
1 hp
 Can't attack, can interact with objects

familiars.name: Spirit Animal
familiars.description:
1hp
 Form animal of your choosing that can't attack

familiars.name: Dire Wolf
familiars.description:
12 hp
str: 14, dex: 12, int: 4
Can cast Mist Form once every 10 min

familiars.name: Mist Goblin
familiars.description:
16 hp, 13 AC
str: 12, dex: 16
 Dagger: 1d6 + dex
 Can cast Mist Form once every 1 min

familiars.name: Pegasus
familiars.description:
32 hp
 Has flight with movement speed of 100 ft
